unnormalised: **Entertainment: Bollywood Releases - It's Raining Sequels (and Maybe Some Sense)**
normalised: **Entertainment: Bollywood Releases - It's Raining Sequels (and Maybe Some Sense)**

unnormalised: Mumbai, Oct 26th: Buckle up, Bollywood buffs! This Diwali, brace yourselves for a cinematic explosion – and potentially, a migraine. We've got sequels coming out of our ears faster than you can say "aloo gobi"!
normalised: Mumbai, October twenty sixth: Buckle up, Bollywood buffs! This Diwali, brace yourselves for a cinematic explosion – and potentially, a migraine. We've got sequels coming out of our ears faster than you can say "aloo gobi"!

unnormalised: First up, *Dhoom 7: Geriatric Drift*, starring a surprisingly spry Amitabh Bachchan on a souped-up scooter, chasing villains across the ghats of Varanasi. Critics are already calling it "a mid-life crisis on wheels."
normalised: First up, *Dhoom seven: Geriatric Drift*, starring a surprisingly spry Amitabh Bachchan on a souped-up scooter, chasing villains across the ghats of Varanasi. Critics are already calling it "a mid-life crisis on wheels."

unnormalised: Then there's *Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham 2: The Grandchildren Get Involved*. Prepare for 3 hours of family drama, awkward dance numbers, and enough tears to fill the Ganges. Expect cameos from every Bollywood A-lister, including a digitally de-aged Shah Rukh Khan!
normalised: Then there's *Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham two: The Grandchildren Get Involved*. Prepare for three hours of family drama, awkward dance numbers, and enough tears to fill the Ganges. Expect cameos from every Bollywood A-lister, including a digitally de-aged Shah Rukh Khan!

unnormalised: And finally, *Munna Bhai MBBS 3: Now With More AI!* Sanjay Dutt returns as the lovable goon-turned-doctor, now battling rogue medical chatbots. Rumor has it, the climax involves saving a patient using only Google Translate and a packet of biryani.
normalised: And finally, *Munna Bhai M B B S three: Now With More A I!* Sanjay Dutt returns as the lovable goon-turned-doctor, now battling rogue medical chatbots. Rumor has it, the climax involves saving a patient using only Google Translate and a packet of biryani.

unnormalised: So, grab your popcorn, your sanity, and maybe some earplugs. Bollywood's back, baby! And it’s wilder than a Holi celebration gone wrong!
normalised: So, grab your popcorn, your sanity, and maybe some earplugs. Bollywood's back, baby! And it’s wilder than a Holi celebration gone wrong!
